title: Recent Superhero Typography
content:
Anyone pls help, I need your comment or idea about this topic...  
I'm searching some information about Superhero Typography (superhero which adapted from comic: marvel, DC), or may be it usually called typeface. Recently, I'm perceiving about superhero typeface on movies poster, and I found almost of them, they have same characters, such as bold, silver, futurictic, strong.... it's just like recent trend about superhero typography...  
Anyone knows why they use that kind of typeface, what are the font name?? and do u guys know who the designers are??? (spiderman, x-men, daredevil, fantastic four, blade, etc....). Anyone knows what site has more information about this?

Thanks & God Bless You All..

shierly  
from Indonesia
